CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.11a, drugindicationmeddraversion (8AN)
E2B (R3): G.k.7.r.2a MedDRA Version for Indication Conformance: Optional, but required if G.k.7.r.2b is populated. Data Type: 4AN OID: None Value Allowed: Numeric and ‘. ‘(dot)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The indication as reported. For multiple indications for the same drug, repeat the entire drug entry, specifying the same drug for each indication. MedDRA terms should be provided as code.
CustomField.label: MedDRA Version for Indication
